name: FatigatuX
description:
Humanity has moved to the moon and is sending its food.   A kind of futuristic and diet-sensitive energy is in charge of getting the food. Try to store as much as you can.

--- PC controls ---

Arrow keys - Moves the player

'P' Pause the game

'Esc' Exit the game

--- Game Rules ---

Try to be as lean as you can.  If you run out of energy, the game will be over.

If you get green food, your lean level it will decrease and will speed up the game.

If you get fat food, your lean level it will increase and will speed down the game.

If you get alcohol, something unexpected will happen. Get energy (bananas) to restore the gameplay.

If you get bananas, your energy it will increase.

--- Green Food ---

Watermelon - 3 points and it will decrease your lean level by 0.3.

Coconut - 2 points and it will decrease your lean level by 0.2.

Avocado - 1 point and it will decrease your lean level by 0.1.

--- Fat Food ---

Steak - Minus 3 points and it will increase your lean level by 0.3.

Burger - Minus 2 points and it will increase your lean level by 0.2.

Pizza - Minus 1 point will it increase your lean level by 0.1.

--- Alcohol ---

It will decrease your energy level by 3.

--- Banana ---

It will increase your energy level by 1.

Have fun :)

Sky -> https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/22933

Fruits Prefabs -> https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/6000

Music -> https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/963328
